title: The Fast and the Furious
description: The film that started it all, where Brian O'Conner infiltrates the world of street racing to catch a gang of thieves.

title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
description: Brian O'Conner teams up with an old friend to bring down a Miami drug lord.

title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
description: A teenager learns the art of drift racing in Tokyo and gets caught up in the world of the Yakuza.

title: Fast & Furious
description: Dominic Toretto and Brian O'Conner reunite to take down a heroin importer.

title: Fast Five
description: Dom and his crew pull off a heist in Rio de Janeiro while being pursued by a relentless federal agent.

title: Fast & Furious 6
description: Dom and his team help Hobbs take down a criminal organization led by a skilled mercenary.

title: Furious 7
description: The crew faces a vengeful adversary while trying to rescue a kpartnapped family member.

title: The Fate of the Furious
description: Dom is coerced into betraying his team and working with a cyberterrorist.

title: F9: The Fast Saga
description: Dom faces off against his estranged brother Jakob, a skilled assassin, in a high-stakes adventure.
